Title: Catchfire
Genre: Action, Comedy, Crime, Drama, Romance, Thriller
Writer: Rachel Kronstadt Mann (story), Rachel Kronstadt Mann (screenplay), Ann Louise Bardach (screenplay)
Actors: Dennis Hopper, Jodie Foster, Dean Stockwell, Vincent Price
Plot: A witness to a mob assassination flees for her life from town to town, switching identities, but cannot seem to elude Milo, the chief killer out to get her.
